channel.description: Table 15-2 Modules for Managing Storage To make sure that your playbook is applied to the right devices, you first need to find which devices are available on your managed system. After you find them, you can use conditionals to make sure that tasks are executed on the right devices. Using Storage-Related Facts Ansible_facts related to storage ansible_devices Available storage and device info ansible_device_links info on how to access storage and other device info ansible_mounts Mount point info ansible ansible1 -m setup -a 'filter=ansible_devices'
